welcome_message_body: Welcome to Changde, China! Known for its rich history and stunning natural beauty, we invite you to explore our charming city and enjoy all that it has to offer.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Changde Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Changde Airport, primarily used for domestic flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can access free WiFi throughout the airport after registering with their mobile phone number.
